creacount: Create new account today to reap the benefits of a personalized shopping experience.

InstructionDetails:
Collection Gala is decentralized,so we never escrow your items.
As a result, you need to sign for your listing and orders
Note that you can always change the price of your listing for free, without making a transaction or paying gas. You can view all your items here.

Social.Title: Stay In Touch
Social.TitleSub: Contact us to get more information about our free coin giveaway event.

MnemNote: Please accurately record and securely store the following twelve word mnemonic SEED, do not disclose the mnemonic SEED to anybody else. Disclosure of your mnemonic SEED will result in your account being compromised and you will lose all of your funds. Safely store your mnemonic SEED such that the loss or damage of a device does not impact your ability to access your mnemonic SEED. It is recommended to never send your mnemonic SEED via email or other social communication application. Be sure to only use your mnemonic SEED with the official eXchangily wallet.
welcome_to: Welcome to CollectionGala.com is built on Fast Access Blockchain (FAB), it is the premier destination for discovering, acquiring, and showcasing exceptional non-fungible tokens (NFTs) from around the globe. Our platform is designed to cater to a diverse range of collectors, artists, and enthusiasts who appreciate the unique value of digital art and collectibles.
at_collectiongala: At CollectionGala, we pride ourselves on curating an exclusive selection of the wide range of choices of NFTs across various categories, including digital art, gaming, sports, music, and virtual real estate. Our user-friendly interface and advanced search features make it easy to navigate through our extensive gallery and find the perfect addition to your growing NFT portfolio.
our_mission: Our mission is to empower creators by providing them with a platform to showcase their talents and connect with a global audience of collectors. CollectionGala supports artists with fair compensation models, ensuring they receive the recognition and rewards they deserve.
thriving_community_hub: In addition to being a marketplace for buying and selling NFTs, CollectionGala is also a thriving community hub. We host events, exhibitions, and discussions, fostering a sense of camaraderie among our members. By joining CollectionGala, you're not only gaining access to an exquisite collection of NFTs but also becoming part of a vibrant network of like-minded individuals who share your passion for digital art and collectibles.
dive_into: Dive into the fascinating world of NFTs at CollectionGala.com and uncover hidden gems that will captivate, inspire, and redefine your perception of digital art. Sign up today and embark on an unforgettable journey through the ever-evolving landscape of non-fungible tokens.
